search.query: | tstats latest(classInfo.name) AS "User" latest(classInfo.firstName) AS "First Name" latest(classInfo.lastName) AS "Last Name" latest(classInfo.email) AS "Email-Id" latest(classInfo.loginDomain) AS "Login Domain" latest(classInfo.actualCiscoAvPair) AS "ciscoAvPair" latest(classInfo.loginTime) AS "Login Time" latest(classInfo.sequenceNumber) AS "Sequence Number" latest(classInfo.unixUserId) AS "Unix User-Id" latest(classInfo.accountStatus) AS "Account Status" latest(classInfo.pwdLifeTime) AS "Password Life Time" latest(classInfo.expiration) AS Expiration latest(classInfo.component) AS Component from datamodel=Systems where (classInfo.component=aaaUser OR classInfo.component=aaaRemoteUser) groupby classInfo.dn, classInfo.apic_host | rename classInfo.apic_host as apic_host | search $formed_apic_host$ | fields - classInfo.dn | eval Type=if(match(Component,"^aaaRemoteUser$"),"Remote User","Local User") | table User,Type,"First Name","Last Name","Email-Id","Login Domain","ciscoAvPair","Login Time","Sequence Number","Unix User-Id","Account Status","Password Life Time","Expiration"
